title: Dio - 1987-11-17 FLAC Palasport San Lazzaro, Padua, Italy
description:
cassette > PC > WAV > CD Wave Editor (track splitting) > FLAC (Trader's Little Helper) 

Tape was provided by and transferred by dime user 'Diocrew'. Thanks Mike! 

11.17.87 - Padua, Italy
Source: Palasport San Lazzaro, Padua, Italy. November 17th 1987
Sound Quality: A
Time: Disc 1: 53:57
Disc 2: 50:24
Disc 1:
1. Stand Up And Shout (4:57)
2. Dream Evil (5:18)
3. Neon Knights (4:30)
4. Rock 'n' Roll Children [w/ Long Live Rock 'n' Roll / Overlove] (10:39)
5. Naked In The Rain [w/ Guitar Solo] (11:22)
6. The Last In Line (5:35)
7. Holy Diver (1:38)
8. Drum Solo (4:25)
9. Heaven And Hell (5:33)
Disc 2:
1. Man On The Silver Mountain (5:00)
2. All The Fools Sailed Away [w/ Keyboard Solo] (15:13)
3. Sunset Superman (7:10)
4. Night People (5:28)
5. Rainbow In The Dark (6:13)
6. We Rock (7:28)
7. The Mob Rules (3:52)

Shared on dime by tonsofsobs January 2014.

I'm searching for any Dio shows (1983-1990) I don't have, but these shows especially. All shows listed below are known to exist.
